name: Ping (itch)
description:
This is my first Unity3D project, an innovative new game never before seen...

Sounds are all under CC Attribution License, thanks to these lovely people. Music is Broke for Free by Night Owl. Worth listening to all the way through!

Feature suggestions? Bugs? Complaints? Email me at jellyberg+Ping@gmail.com

The iPhone version is now also available! Download for free - no in app purchases or ads!
